# provisioner jobs

View and manage provisioner jobs

Aliases:

* job

## Usage

```console
coder provisioner jobs
```

## Subcommands

| Name                                                | Purpose                  |
|-----------------------------------------------------|--------------------------|
| [<code>cancel</code>](./provisioner_jobs_cancel) | Cancel a provisioner job |
| [<code>list</code>](./provisioner_jobs_list)     | List provisioner jobs    |
